alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 13 at 3:32PM HST until November 14 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND KAUAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... .A northwest swell (320 degrees) will produce advisory level surf heights along north and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai and along north facing shores of Oahu, Molokai, and Maui through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Surf 10 to 15 feet along north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai. * WHERE...Niihau, Kauai Southwest, Oahu North Shore, Olomana, Maui Windward West, Kauai North, Koolau Windward, Molokai Windward, Molokai North and Windward Haleakala. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala
